title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid details and role selection (client or freelancer).

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/register with valid name, email, password, and role
Verify response status code is 201
Verify response confirms user registration success
Verify user is stored with hashed password

title: User Registration Validation Failure
description: Verify registration fails with invalid or missing fields and disallow duplicate emails.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/register with missing required fields
Verify response status code is 400 with validation error message
Send POST request with existing email
Verify response status code is 400 with user already exists error

title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can log in with correct email and password and receives JWT token.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with valid email and password
Verify response status code is 200
Verify response contains valid JWT token

title: User Login Failure
description: Verify login fails with incorrect credentials or blocked account.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with invalid password
Verify response status code is 401 with invalid credentials message
Attempt login with blocked user account
Verify response status code is 403 with account blocked message

title: Access Protected Route Without Token
description: Verify accessing protected routes fails without JWT token or with invalid token.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/auth/me without Authorization header
Verify response status code is 401 Unauthorized
Send GET request to /api/auth/me with invalid/expired token
Verify response status code is 401 Unauthorized

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that clients, freelancers, and admin roles have access only to their respective APIs and actions.

steps.description: Login as freelancer and attempt to create a job (client only)
Verify response status code is 403 Forbidden
Login as client and attempt to access admin dashboard
Verify response status code is 403 Forbidden
Login as admin and perform admin-only actions
Verify successful response code 200 or 201

title: Create Job Posting Valid Input
description: Verify that authenticated clients can create job postings with valid inputs.

steps.description: Login as client and send POST to /api/jobs with valid job details
Verify response status code is 201 Created
Verify job is stored and retrievable via GET requests

title: Create Job Posting Validation Failure
description: Verify job creation fails with invalid or missing required data.

steps.description: Send POST to /api/jobs with missing title or budget
Verify response status code is 400 with validation error
Send POST to /api/jobs as non-client user
Verify response status code is 403 Forbidden

title: Job Browsing and Filtering
description: Verify that freelancers can browse jobs and filter by category and status.

steps.description: Login as freelancer and GET /api/jobs without filters
Verify response lists available jobs
GET /api/jobs with category and status filters
Verify returned jobs match filters

title: Place Bid Success
description: Verify that authenticated freelancers can place bids on open jobs with valid proposals.

steps.description: Login as freelancer and send POST to /api/bids with jobId of open job, bid amount, and message
Verify response status code is 201 Created
Verify bid is stored and retrievable

title: Place Bid Failure for Closed or Invalid Job
description: Verify bidding is rejected for jobs that are not open or do not exist.

steps.description: Send POST to /api/bids for a job with status closed
Verify response status code is 400 or 403 indicating bidding not allowed
Send POST with invalid jobId
Verify response status code is 404 Job not found

title: View Client's Jobs
description: Verify that a client can retrieve a list of their own posted jobs.

steps.description: Login as client and GET /api/jobs/client/my-jobs
Verify response status code is 200
Verify response contains only jobs posted by client

title: Hire Freelancer by Accepting Bid
description: Verify clients can hire a freelancer by accepting one of the bids on their job when job status is open.

steps.description: Login as client and send PUT to /api/bids/{bidId}/hire for a bid on an open job
Verify response status code is 200
Verify job status updates to hired and associated freelancer is set

title: Hire Freelancer Failure on Non-Open Job
description: Verify hire bid action is rejected if the job is not open for hiring.

steps.description: Attempt to hire by PUT /api/bids/{bidId}/hire on job with status other than open
Verify response status code is 400 with appropriate error message

title: Messaging Between Client and Freelancer
description: Verify authenticated users can send and retrieve messages related to specific jobs if authorized.

steps.description: Send POST to /api/messages with valid jobId, receiverId, and message content
Verify response status code is 201 Message sent
Send GET to /api/messages/job/{jobId} as authorized user
Verify response lists all messages for the job

title: Messaging Error Handling for Unauthorized Access
description: Verify messaging APIs deny access if the job does not exist or user is unauthorized.

steps.description: Send GET to /api/messages/job/{invalidJobId}
Verify response status code is 404 Job not found
Send GET to /api/messages/job/{jobId} as a user not involved in the job
Verify response status code is 403 Access denied

title: Admin Dashboard Access and Data Retrieval
description: Verify admin users can access the dashboard endpoint and receive platform statistics.

steps.description: Login as admin and send GET to /api/admin/dashboard
Verify response status code is 200 and contains expected statistics data

title: Admin User Management - Block/Unblock User
description: Verify that admin can block or unblock users but cannot block admin users themselves.

steps.description: Login as admin and send PUT to /api/admin/users/{userId}/status with status 'blocked'
Verify response status 200 and user status updated
Try to block another admin user
Verify response status 403 Forbidden

title: Admin User Management - Delete User
description: Verify that admin can delete users but cannot delete admin users themselves.

steps.description: Login as admin and send DELETE to /api/admin/users/{userId}
Verify response status 200 User deleted
Try to delete an admin user
Verify response status 403 Forbidden

title: Admin Manage Jobs - Force Close Job
description: Verify that admin can force close jobs via the admin API.

steps.description: Login as admin and send PUT to /api/admin/jobs/{jobId}/close
Verify response status 200 Job closed
Attempt to force close a non-existent job
Verify response status 404 Job not found

title: Update User Profile Successfully
description: Verify authenticated users can update their profile (bio, skills, name) with valid data.

steps.description: Login as user and send PUT to /api/auth/profile with valid update payload
Verify response status code is 200 Profile updated
Send GET to /api/auth/me to confirm profile data updated
Verify response reflects updated profile information

title: Update User Profile Unauthorized Access
description: Verify update profile API denies access without authorization.

steps.description: Send PUT to /api/auth/profile without JWT
Verify response status 401 Unauthorized

title: Update Job Status by Client
description: Verify clients can update status of their jobs to valid statuses only.

steps.description: Login as client and send PUT to /api/jobs/{jobId}/status with valid status field
Verify response status 200 Status updated
Send PUT with invalid status value
Verify response status 400 Invalid status
Attempt to update status for job not owned by client
Verify response status 403 Access denied

title: Health Check API Response
description: Verify health check endpoint responds with server status correctly.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/health
Verify response status code is 200
Verify response JSON contains status and message fields indicating server is running

title: Delete Job by Client
description: Verify clients can delete jobs they posted and cannot delete jobs they do not own.

steps.description: Login as client and send DELETE to /api/jobs/{jobId} for a job owned by client
Verify response status 200 Job deleted
Attempt to delete job owned by another client
Verify response status 403 Forbidden
Attempt to delete non-existent job
Verify response status 404 Job not found

title: Get Single Job Details
description: Verify authenticated users can retrieve job details by ID and receive appropriate errors if not found.

steps.description: Send GET to /api/jobs/{validJobId}
Verify response status 200 with correct job data
Send GET to /api/jobs/{invalidJobId}
Verify response status 404 Job not found

title: Get Freelancer Bids
description: Verify freelancer can retrieve all their bids successfully.

steps.description: Login as freelancer and send GET to /api/bids/my-bids
Verify response status 200 and lists only bids placed by the freelancer

title: Admin View All Jobs and Users Access Control
description: Verify only admin users can access endpoints to get all jobs and users, others are forbidden.

steps.description: Login as admin and send GET to /api/admin/jobs and /api/admin/users
Verify response status 200 and data listed
Login as client or freelancer and attempt the same GET requests
Verify response status 403 Forbidden

title: Validation of Input Data with Joi Schemas
description: Verify that all user input endpoints implement Joi validation and return 400 on invalid payloads.

steps.description: Send requests with invalid data formats or missing required fields to registration, login, job posting, bidding, and messaging endpoints
Verify response status code is 400 with detailed validation error messages

title: Password Security - Hashing Before Storage
description: Verify user passwords are hashed with bcrypt before database storage.

steps.description: Register new user
Verify in database that stored password is hashed and not plain text
